title: [Health] Study: Research links gut fungi to intestinal inflammation in Crohn’s disease patients. Findings show that the imbalance of fungi and bacteria can create a predisposition to inflammatory bowel disease.

[Neuroscience] UCI-led team first to discover new neural circuits that regulate spatial learning and memory in the brain’s hippocampal formation | Understanding of novel functional roles can advance research in Alzheimer’s disease, other learning and memory disorders
